page.title: 11SHEFFIELD WEDNESDAY
page.content: {Sheffield Wednesday F.C.}is an important part of life round here. When Wednesday are doing well people say that they feel better and even work harder. Others say that Wednesday's success is good for business. We asked{542}people (of whom {57%}were male) what they thought. We weren't surprised to find that most women didn't like football. Even so, {482 }said that Wednesday's success was important for the area. {74%}of those interested in football supported Wednesday but few of them went to matches:- {HOME AWAY 26% {attended most games } 7.5% 17% {attended some games }7% 15.5%{attended 1 or 2 games}10% 45.5%{only followed results}75.5%
